data.description:
Peaceful Places is a realistic, nature-themed VR experience created for relaxation and reflection, including 35 scenes featuring hand-stitched 360° photography by Sam Stevens paired with ambient downtempo music from Esperas' debut album, Keep Searching. 

Enjoy the nostalgic feeling of being in nature while transporting yourself to beautiful, remote locations across the US. Peaceful Places was developed with the intention of creating a unique experience that inspires a feeling of being centered and at peace. Experience the highest quality, nature-themed VR environments paired with a minimal UI to maintain true immersion. 

Where are your Peaceful Places?

360° Photography / Videography: Sam Stevens - Dreams Lost In Time 
360° Prints of each VR environment available at www.dreamslostintime.com

Music: "Spirit" and "In the Wake Of Blooming" by Esperas
Composed, Recorded & Produced by Sam Stevens
soundcloud.com/esperas
